mapper.sql: s.StorageExpenditure_Id, s.Storage_Number, s.Refund_Date, s.Refund_details, s.Storage_Count, s.TotalMoney, s.AddName, s.AddTime, s.UpdateName, s.UpdateTime, s.DeleteName, s.DeleteTime, s.TimeLiness, s.Approval, s.AppName, s.AppTime, s.RevokeAppTime, s.RevokeAppName, s.BookStorage_Id, s.Book_Id
mapper.select:
select
from storageexpenditure s inner join book b on b.Book_Id=s.Book_Id where s.StorageExpenditure_Id = #{storageexpenditureId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and s.TimeLiness=0
select ,b.BookName from storageexpenditure s inner join book b on b.Book_Id=s.Book_Id where s.Approval = #{approval,jdbcType=INTEGER} and s.TimeLiness=0
mapper.insert: insert into storageexpenditure (Storage_Number,Refund_details, Storage_Count, TotalMoney, AddName,UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime,AppName, AppTime, RevokeAppTime, RevokeAppName, BookStorage_Id, Book_Id) values (#{storageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{revokeapptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{revokeappname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookstorageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update storageexpenditure
Storage_Number = #{storageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Refund_Date = #{refundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Refund_details = #{refundDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Storage_Count = #{storageCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TotalMoney = #{totalmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Approval = #{approval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AppName = #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppTime = #{apptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RevokeAppTime = #{revokeapptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RevokeAppName = #{revokeappname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BookStorage_Id = #{bookstorageId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Book_Id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where StorageExpenditure_Id = #{storageexpenditureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
